name: Night City (itch) (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player needs to get to the end of the level without spending all their lives.
  • Click D - hero going to the right. Click A - hero going to the left. Click SPACE to jump. And left click on mouse to shoot.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Night-City

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
